Uses of Interface
org.jruyi.io.IBuffer

  • Packages that use IBuffer 
    Package Description
    org.jruyi.io
    JRuyi IO Package Version 1.0

    • Uses of IBuffer in org.jruyi.io

      Methods in org.jruyi.io that return IBuffer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IBuffer IBuffer.compact()
      Compacts this buffer by dropping all the data before the current position.
      IBuffer IBufferFactory.create()
      Creates a new buffer.
      IBuffer ISession.createBuffer()
      Creates an empty buffer using the buffer factory associated with this session.
      IBuffer IBuffer.newBuffer()
      Creates a new empty buffer using the same buffer factory instance that created this buffer.
      IBuffer IBuffer.prepend(byte b)
      Writes the given byte b to the head of the buffer.
      IBuffer IBuffer.prepend(char c, ICharCodec codec)
      Writes the bytes, encoded from the specified character c with the specified codec, to the head of this buffer.
      IBuffer IBuffer.prepend(double d, IDoubleCodec codec)
      Writes the bytes, encoded from the specified double value d with the specified codec, to the head of this buffer.
      IBuffer IBuffer.prepend(float f, IFloatCodec codec)
      Writes the bytes, encoded from the specified float value f with the specified codec, to the head of this buffer.
      IBuffer IBuffer.prepend(int i, IIntCodec codec)
      Writes the bytes, encoded from the specified int value i with the specified codec, to the head of this buffer.
      IBuffer IBuffer.prepend(long l, ILongCodec codec)
      Writes the bytes, encoded from the specified long value l with the specified codec, to the head of this buffer.
      IBuffer IBuffer.prepend(short s, IShortCodec codec)
      Writes the bytes, encoded from the specified short value s with the specified codec, to the head of this buffer.
      <T> IBuffer IBuffer.prepend(T src, ICodec<T> codec)
      Writes the bytes, encoded from the specified object src with the specified codec, to the head of this buffer.
      <T> IBuffer IBuffer.prepend(T src, int offset, int length, ICodec<T> codec)
      Writes the bytes, encoded from the specified collection src with the specified codec starting at offset ending at (offset + length), to the head of this buffer.
      IBuffer IBuffer.prependFill(byte b, int count)
      Writes count b values to the head of the underlying buffer.
      IBuffer IBuffer.set(int index, byte b)
      Sets the byte at the specified position to the given byte b.
      IBuffer IBuffer.set(int index, char c, ICharCodec codec)
      Sets the bytes starting at the specified index to the ones encoded from the specified character c with the specified codec.
      IBuffer IBuffer.set(int index, double d, IDoubleCodec codec)
      Sets the bytes starting at the specified index to the ones encoded from the specified double value d with the specified codec.
      IBuffer IBuffer.set(int index, float f, IFloatCodec codec)
      Sets the bytes starting at the specified index to the ones encoded from the specified float value f with the specified codec.
      IBuffer IBuffer.set(int index, int i, IIntCodec codec)
      Sets the bytes starting at the specified index to the ones encoded from the specified int value i with the specified codec .
      IBuffer IBuffer.set(int index, long l, ILongCodec codec)
      Sets the bytes starting at the specified index to the ones encoded from the specified long value l with the specified codec.
      IBuffer IBuffer.set(int index, short s, IShortCodec codec)
      Sets the bytes starting at the specified index to the ones encoded from the specified short value s with the specified codec.
      <T> IBuffer IBuffer.set(int index, T src, ICodec<T> codec)
      Sets the bytes starting at the specified index to the ones encoded from the specified src of type T with the specified codec.
      <T> IBuffer IBuffer.set(int index, T src, int offset, int length, ICodec<T> codec)
      Sets the bytes starting at the specified index to the ones encoded from the specified collection src, starting at the specified offset, ending at (offset + length) with the specified codec.
      IBuffer IBuffer.setFill(int index, byte b, int count)
      Sets all count bytes starting at the specified start to the specified byte b.
      IBuffer IBuffer.setLength(int newLength)
      Adjusts the length of the buffer to the specified newLength.
      IBuffer IBuffer.split(int size)
      Splits this buffer into two pieces and returns the first piece.
      IBuffer IBuffer.write(byte b)
      Writes the given byte b to the end of this buffer.
      IBuffer IBuffer.write(char c, ICharCodec codec)
      Writes the bytes, decoded from the specified char value c with the specified codec, to the end of this buffer.
      IBuffer IBuffer.write(double d, IDoubleCodec codec)
      Writes the bytes, decoded from the specified double value d with the specified codec, to the end of this buffer.
      IBuffer IBuffer.write(float f, IFloatCodec codec)
      Writes the bytes, decoded from the specified float value f with the specified codec, to the end of this buffer.
      IBuffer IBuffer.write(int i, IIntCodec codec)
      Writes the bytes, decoded from the specified int value i with the specified codec, to the end of this buffer.
      IBuffer IBuffer.write(long l, ILongCodec codec)
      Writes the bytes, decoded from the specified long value l with the specified codec, to the end of this buffer.
      IBuffer IBuffer.write(short s, IShortCodec codec)
      Writes the bytes, decoded from the specified short value s with the specified codec, to the end of this buffer.
      <T> IBuffer IBuffer.write(T src, ICodec<T> codec)
      Writes the bytes, decoded from the specified object src with the specified codec, to the end of this buffer.
      <T> IBuffer IBuffer.write(T src, int offset, int length, ICodec<T> codec)
      Writes the bytes, decoded from the specified collection src starting at the specified offset ending at the specified (offset + length) with the specified codec, to the end of this buffer.
      IBuffer IBuffer.writeFill(byte b, int count)
      Writes count b values into the underlying buffer.
      Methods in org.jruyi.io with parameters of type IBuffer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IBuffer.drainTo(IBuffer dst)
      Writes all the remaining data into the end of the given dst.
      int IFilter.tellBoundary(ISession session, IBuffer in)
      Returns the message length by reading and parsing the specified bufferReader.
      int Filter.tellBoundary(ISession session, IBuffer in)
      Returns the current length of the given in as the message boundary.
